WRITING.TITLE: Fair share heists.
WRITING.TEXT: Anybody interested in doing the heists missions. No glitches or anything dumb. I just wanted to complete them in order to me to be able to purchase the vehicles. Everyone gets a fair share of money. Before joining be ready @ 9:30 Eastern time and must have mic. Gamertag: Driver17789 P.S. We'll have a blast and some laughs doing it!

WRITING.TITLE: [Solution] Rude players flying jets.
WRITING.TEXT: Remember that the lobby can always vote to have that person kicked from the lobby. Go to menu, online, players select and then kick. This would help a lot of players because instead of stealing the car I'm exporting people in jets will come and blow them up. Just gets annoying and recently there has been a sudden increase in the annoying players that fly jets.
